My Work

check out some of my projects

Realtime Trivia game where you can create a lobby and invite your friends with the link provided after lobby has been created. As the host of the lobby you are in change of sending questions out to all of the players. This game was created with the purpuse to use the following technologies:

React

Redux

Firebase

CSS3
